data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core TSCHEPPA, Lej da la Tscheppa, Switzerland
Lake. Physiography: dead-ice hollow in Upper Engadine valley. Surrounding vegetation: alpine. Location: in the lake. Notes: from Alpadaba
Seasonal temperatures for the past ~400 years reconstructed from diatom and chironomid assemblages in a high-altitude lake (Lej da la Tscheppa, Switzerland)
